article_title: Israel and Hezbollah play with fire as fears grow of another war

article_title: Israel and Hezbollah play with fire as fears grow of another war
sentence: It  would  be  hard  for  him  to  claim  victory  in  Gaza  without  killing,  capturing  or  expelling  the  Hamas  leadership,  and  while  the  group  still  has  organised  battalions  intact.
